original_text: The Babylonians who are attacking this city will come in and set it on fire; they will burn it down, along with the houses where the people aroused my anger by burning incense on the roofs to Baal and by pouring out drink offerings to other gods.
korean_text: 이 성을 치는 갈대아인이 와서 이 성읍에 불을 놓아 성과 집 곧 그 지붕에서 바알에게 분향하며 다른 신들에게 전제를 드려 나를 격노하게 한 집들을 사르리니

sentences.original_text: The Babylonians who are attacking this city
will come in and set it on fire
where the people aroused my anger
by burning incense on the roofs to Baal
and by pouring out drink offerings to other gods
